summary: Ads functional Stargate in SGC to the world of Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=15]New version out[/size][/b]

[b][size=3]Description[/size][/b]
This new release is sort of complete reconstructure of the first release. 

[b][size=3]Changes[/size][/b]
- No rings all over Skyrim
- new imperial fort. Fort Cheyenne with SGC in it\'s depths.
- new design if the Stargate.
     - Slightly \'upgraded\' texture.
     - All symbols on the gate are star constellations found in Skyrim. Birth-signs, skill trees.
     - new design of the event horizon.
     - completely redone underlying script. So far working way better than before.
     - Due to new scripts it\'s possible to activate multiple gates at once. Connection from gate A to B, and from C to D etc...
     - Built-in ability to easily add more gates.

More info in readme file included in the downloadable .rar

[b][size=3]Adding new gates - using in other mods[/size][/b]
The whole process in described in a \"resource\" file (Adding gates guide) downloadable from miscellaneous section.
There\'s a video guide on adding a gate to Solitude. Readme file that describes how stargate works and how the adding process works. There\'s also a DemoMod created when recording the video guide. 


[b][size=5]Installation[/size][/b]
Easy as pie.

* Presuming you have skyrim and it\'s latest update
* Download and install latest SKSE - http://skse.silverlock.org/
* Download \"Stargate mod v2\", unpack to your game\'s data folder and you\'re done.
All readme files are in ...Skyrim\\Data\\Readmes\\...


[b][size=3]Usage - permissions[/size][/b]
Do whatever you want with it. Upload, reload, download, overload, unload. Dismantle it, use just parts any way you wish.
I\'d just be glad to know it so I might use your mod instead :D

Same goes for anyone adding new stargates or stargate mods. I\'ll be glad to use your mods connected to Stargate framework. Let me know through message system here on nexus.

[b][size=3]Bugs - questions[/size][/b]
If you have any questions in regards to functionality or have found any bugs send me a message here on nexus, don\'t post it just in comments section.


[b][size=3]Thanks[/size][/b]
darthmop1 - for offering help/files with event horizon which are not used but hinted the method used in the final result.

cschulz - for reporting errors in pre-final release which made me redo (and improve) all the scripts 

- and all others for hinting problems and suggesting improvements
author: UMP1R3
